entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
